name: Touhou: Sealing Song
description:
A new Touhou story starring the "Secret Sealing Club"!

With Maribel's birthday coming up, Renko declares that she's going to get her the "bestest present ever"! She decides to make a song... Which ends up being a lot harder than she first thought! Help Renko make a song in this short (and slightly interactive) Touhou Visual Novel made for Touhou Fan Game Jam 7!

Controls

  • Z Key: Advance Text, Select
  • Arrow Keys: Move Objects
  • 5 Key: Windowed Mode
  • 6 Key: Full-Screen Mode
  • Escape Key: Quit Game

Credits

  • Megapig9001: Directing, Programming, Writing
  • Kalcicat: Art (Check them out here)
  • Wookywok: Composer (First Two Songs), Sound Design, Proofreading, Writing Support (Check them out here)
  • JaCoder23: Composer (Last Two Songs) (Check them out here)
  • DJThunderHeart: Standard Backgrounds, Engine Assets (both from prior projects) (Check them out here)
  • MelinPie: Writing Consultant (Check them out here)
  • Anzaii: Target Reticle Art
  • CaptainDiz: Magatama Art (Check them out here)

"Dog Growling" Sound Effect by Mike Koeing

The following is a derivative work of the "Touhou Project" series. Touhou and all of its characters are owned by Team Shanghai Alice.

Merry's Magatama

Included with the game, "Merry's Magatama" will allow you to unlock content related to "Touhou Sealing Song" in future games that are compatible!
